sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_BKMK WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND GOODS_CODE = #goods_code#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BKMK (ESNTL_ID, GOODS_CODE, REGIST_ID, REGIST_DT) VALUES (#esntl_id#, #goods_code#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TB_BKMK WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND GOODS_CODE = #goods_code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_BKMK B INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON B.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE B.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#

SELECT X.GOODS_CODE, X.GOODS_NM, X.GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL, X.FILE_CODE , (SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(AVG(REVIEW_SCORE), 0), 'FM999990.0') FROM TB_PURCHS_REVIEW WHERE GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# ) AS REVIEW_SCORE FROM ( SELECT GOODS_CODE, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT B.GOODS_CODE FROM TB_BKMK B INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON B.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE B.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# ORDER BY G.GOODS_NM ) B ) BB INNER JOIN TB_GOODS X ON X.GOODS_CODE = BB.GOODS_CODE AND X.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startIdx# AND #endIdx#
